languages.text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g} also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of an enemy by −<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Forceful Strike also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g} of an enemy by −(5 + Fighter's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}).

Forceful Strike also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of an enemy by −(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}).

Forceful Strike also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of an enemy by −(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}).

languages.text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}强力打击{/g}还会降低目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}，减值等同于<u>（5+{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。
languages.original_text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g} also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of an enemy by −<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: 强力打击还会降低目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}，减值等同于（5+{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）。

languages.text: Отталкивающий удар также уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} противника на (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g}).
languages.original_text: Forceful Strike also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of an enemy by −(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Отталкивающий удар также уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} противника на (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g}).

Отталкивающий удар также уменьшает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} противника на (5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}СИЛ{/g}).

languages.text: 力強い攻撃は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}を−(5+{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}) を減少する。
languages.original_text: Forceful Strike also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of an enemy by −(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}).

traits.locale_text: 力強い攻撃は敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}を−(5+ファイターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}) を減少する。

languages.text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Golpe vigoroso{/g} también reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} de un enemigo en −<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g})</u>.
languages.original_text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g} also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of an enemy by −<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Golpe vigoroso también reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g} de un enemigo en −(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}FUE{/g} del guerrero).

languages.text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Kraftvoller Hieb{/g} verringert ferner die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g} eines Feindes um −<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Kriegers{/g})</u>.
languages.original_text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g} also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of an enemy by −<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Kraftvoller Hieb verringert zusätzlich {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF{/g} eines Feindes um -(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STÄ{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} des Kämpfers).

languages.text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Coup puissant{/g} réduit également de −<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g})</u> la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} d'un ennemi.
languages.original_text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g} also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of an enemy by −<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.

traits.locale_text: Coup puissant réduit également de −(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g}) la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g} d'un ennemi.

languages.text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Güç Atağı{/g}, ayrıca bir düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} niteliklerini <u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}'nın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}KUV{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g})</u> kadar azaltır.
languages.original_text: {g|f:93d58dfeb6c648858c130e0a902f6ed6}Forceful Strike{/g} also decreases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} of an enemy by −<u>(5 + {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u>.
